title: G Perico & T-Rell Discuss Their History Together, Jay-Z Stories & More
description:
G Perico talks about Roc Nation, shares Jay-Z stories, meeting T-Rell at a Diddy party, his several businesses and more!

------
00:00 Intro
0:49 T-Rell is offended that Perico calls him "OG"
1:50 T-Rell wanna know about the "blue tshirt" trend that's actually not blue
4:09 G Perico is finally introduced
8:22 Prison made him more ignorant if anything, till the last time he went in and told himself that he would never come back
10:08 His celly was supposed to be a opp but he was actually super cool and he made sure Perico was good
13:05 So Way Out movement abruptly ended for creative and business differences
19:55 Keepin it real for who? You must keep it real with yourself first
24:40 Says most rappers make excuses for not doing anything or blame someone else
31:18 Being around Jay-Z really fed him a lot of information and motivation
32:08 Tells a funny story about Jay-Z and a guy who tried to sell them jewelry
33:28 T-Rell and Perico first met a Diddy party, T-Rell was "fannin out"
35:03 Perico tried to talk to Tyrese that night, but Tyrese looked at him, ignored him, and walked off
39:49 Perico on owning the boxing gym around their area is a big deal
45:22 Perico says T-Rell used to walk around with cr*ck on him
46:14 T-Rell admits "handing over" some cr*ck to a cr*ckh*ad
46:59 Name a rapper who is a millionaire who is not promoting liquor
48:43 Younger rappers expecting OGs to tap in with them or be a certain way, Perico says he won't give a list of people he wanna work with coz he wants to meet them first and see if they cool or corny
49:54 Perico says he ain't got family like that but his daughter, his parents are somewhere doing them


-----
